text:
@realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods The flattery U received from CEO is undeserved, and I’m not drinking your koolaid. U R the most egregious person to EVER occupy the Presidentcy.  We all must Vote this fall. Make a change. America depends on us more than ever to defend our democracy.
#SaturdayThoughts #COVID19
